metadata.title: CVE-2021-47181 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: usb:musb: tusb6010: check return value after calling platform_get_resource() Itwill cause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL, we needcheck the return value.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
